Service Details: - Offers a one-stop shop where families and children can drop-in for information or attend a program offered by a network of local agencies that suits their needs, such as early learning programs, or parent and tot drop-ins- Provides referrals to intervention services, health services, social supports such as housing and rental assistance, food security, low cost services/activities and other resources available in the community
